sentence: Hamas'  surprise  Oct.  7  assault  on  southern  Israel  was  the  deadliest  attack  in  Israeli  history,  killing  1,200  people,  according  to  Israeli  officials.
It  prompted  Israel's  deadliest  war  on  Palestinians,  killing  more  than  27,000  people  in  Gaza,  according  to  Gaza  health  officials.
